name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
text: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

name: Winged Kuriboh
text: If this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the GY: For the rest of this turn, you take no battle damage.

name: Elemental HERO Avian
text: A winged Elemental HERO who wheels through the sky and manipulates the wind. His signature move, Featherbreak, gives villainy a blow from sky-high.

name: Alligator's Sword
text: Aey, dis mighty lissard man can swing his sword so fast, dat it's more dan da speed a sound!
